venue.name: FINZ SEAFOOD & GRILL Pickering Wharf Salem

item.description:
http://www.salem-chamber.org/documents/Finz_2.pdf

 

Is anyone interested in meeting for a Peabody Essex Museum Museum and then afterward at my favorite restaurant in Salem?? I am up for suggestions either way.

Here is the Salem Restaurant Week List.(Notice not all offer a 2 Course Prefix Menu $15 Lunch option, MOST a 3 Course Prefix Dinner for $25. Some do offer both a 2 course for $15 or 3 course for $25 Prefix Dinner)

 

Nathaniel's allows you to pick any dessert from the regular menu!!

(I look at the dessert Menu First!!!! for each choice)
item.how_to_find_us: Find eachother in the bar area on the big livingroom couches
item.name: Salem Restaurant Week @ FINZ Seafood
